sub_title: Director at ECOREC Economics Research and Consulting
summary:
• Director (2012-present). ECOREC Economic Research and Consulting, Amsterdam, The Netherlands. 
• Senior Economist (2007–2012). Development Research Institute (IVO), Tilburg University, Tilburg, The Netherlands.
• Senior Economist (2005-06). FAO of the United Nations, Rome, Italy.
• Visiting Professor (2004–05). Wageningen University, Agricultural Economics & Rural Policy Group, Wageningen, The Netherlands.
• Lecturer (2004). Inholland University, School of Economics, Amsterda, The Netherlands.
• Research Fellow (2000–04). International Service for National Agricultural Research (ISNAR) - CGIAR, The Hauge, The Netherlands.
• Deputy Director and Associate Prof. of Economics (1997–2000). Free University of Amsterdam - Centre for World Food Studies, The Netherlands.
• Research Fellow (1995–1997). Rutgers University,
Department of Agricultural Economics, New Brunswick, USA.
• Research Associate (1993–994). University of
Minnesota, Department of Applied Economics, St. Paul, USA.
• Economist (1991). International Monetary Fund (IMF),
Treasurer’s Department, Washington, D.C., USA.
• Teaching and Research Assistant (1991–1993). University of Minnesota, Departments of Economics, Department of Applied Economics, and Management Information Division, Minneapolis, USA.
• Economist (1986–1990). Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey, Research Department, Ankara, Turkey.

Specialties: Technology, institutions and economic growth; health and economic development; institutional and technological impact assessment; science and innovation policy; applied general equilibrium models; priority setting and needs assessment in agricultural R&D.
